person.personAbout: Tiffany has experience as a business analyst for 15 years. Driven by her passion to solve business problems digitally, she founded this company to accomplish just that.
Jill is a Subject Matter Expert in Marketing with 10 years of experience. She contributes her knowledge to ensure that the released marketing softwares solve every marketing problem possible.
Tim is a great agile team leader who coordinates the development of our softwares. With 20 years of coding experience, he ensures our softwares are of world-class quality.
